Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: The building is conveniently located just two miles to Route 3 and only 6.5 miles to Interstate 93. Recent building improvements include a new gym with steam room and sauna, paved parking lot, new building security system and fenced outside storage.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: 81 Commerce Drive is located in the established Fall River Industrial Park, offering convenient highway access to Route 24, and Interstates 495 and 195. This first class facility offers ample on-site parking excellent interior finishes and 8 loading docks. It is an ultra modern facility with a two-story atrium entrance and offers updated industrial space as well as office space.

The site benefits from an abundance of amenities along Route 24 including restaurants, hotels, daycare and other business services.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: On behalf of our client, CBRE is pleased to present an exciting opportunity to lease urban industrial space at 88 Black Falcon Pier. Black Falcon Pier has 191,000 SF of first-floor industrial space with two floors of office above. The building is located in the Marine Industrial Park in Boston, Massachusetts. The building is subdividable to approximately 7,000 SF and Suites 148, 150 and 155 can be combined for 32,483 SF of contiguous space. Building features to note include 20’ clear height with 77 loading docks, 555 spaces with a 125’ truck court, cafe and fitness center.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: CBRE is pleased to present the availability of a ±15,350 SF suite and a ±29,753 SF suite at 85 John Road in Canton. The site is in excess of 29 acres and is equipped with many unique features. The available suite at 135 Will Drive offer 2000A of power and a generous
1.43/1,000 SF parking ratio, with potential expansion. Located 16 miles south of Boston's Central Business District, this best-in-class high-bay facility can be utilized for freezer, cooler or dry storage space. With easy access to I-95 and Routes 24 and 128, this is a tremendous opportunity for a dry or cold-storage tenant.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: CBRE’s Industrial team is pleased to present the immediate availability of ±102,000 SF of first-class dry and temperature controlled space at 135 Will Drive in Canton, Massachusetts. Corporate neighbors include RCN, DSG, E.M. Duggan and H.T. Berry Company.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: With immediate access to highways, commuter rail, and immediate adjacency to Boston's urban core, 960 Mass Ave is located in the heart of urban Boston with unbeatable regional accessibility.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: 960 Mass Ave offers 68,500 SF of available open floor plates with unlimited possibilities. From industrial to flex- tech, the expansive layout and building infrastructure offer tenants ultimate flexibility to meet any use.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Make Your Space at 960 Mass Ave

With easy access to Interstate 93 and proximity to all major
population centers, the site offers a tremendous opportunity
for a dry or cold-storage tenant looking for a truly
urban distribution center. Corporate neighbors include
Anheuser-Busch, ABC Supply and Penske Truck Rental.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
On behalf of Stockbridge, CBRE’s Industrial team is
pleased to bring to your attention an exciting and unique
availability of up to ±90,885 SF of high-bay, temperaturecontrolled
space at 23 Sycamore Avenue in Medford,
Massachusetts. Located just three miles from Boston’s
Central Business District, this best-in-class high-bay facility
which can be utilized as a freezer, cooler or dry storage.
The building offers unparalleled 40' clear height in
±64,752 SF and 28' clear height in ±26,133 SF, with 12
loading docks and generous column spacing throughout.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Best-In-Class - Urban High-Bay Cold Storage

Common.SpaceDescription.Common.Text:
CBRE is pleased to bring to your attention the availability of a ±60,000 SF flex/industrial facility at 44 Cabot Boulevard in Mansfield, Massachusetts. The site is located in the Cabot Business Park, at the intersection of Interstates 95 and 495, just 30 miles from Boston. This property is designed to accommodate R&D/flex, warehouse and manufacturing operations. With an additional parcel along Hampshire Street, the site can accommodate an
additional +/-15,000 SF building or excess parking, up to 18+ trailer spaces or 36+ van spaces. Available Fall 2021

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
The
site is located in the Cabot Business Park, at the intersection of Interstates 95 and 495, just 30 miles from Boston. This property is designed to accommodate R&D/flex, warehouse, and manufacturing operations.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: CBRE/New England’s Industrial team is pleased to bring to your attention the availability of a ±20,000-60,000 SF flex/industrial facility at 44 Cabot Boulevard in Mansfield, Massachusetts.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: New Construction

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
Just two miles from the intersection of I-95/I-93 with direct access off of I-93 at Exit 38, the site has excellent proximity to Boston (15 miles) and the entire New England highway system. The location within
the Metro North market offers a highly skilled labor force from Boston to Southern New Hampshire, and from the North Shore to the Western suburbs. The building offers specifications like concrete block construction, easy subdivisibility, and 26’ clear height that are rarely found within the Metro North.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: 42 Rear Industrial Way is a unique standalone opportunity with above-market 1 per 3,815 SF loading capacity and tremendous curb appeal within one of the most desirable industrial/flex parks in New England.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: First Class Standalone Warehouse at 42R Industrial Way

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Located along the Watertown/Waltham line, the site is just minutes from the heart of Kendall Square and the East Cambridge life sciences clusters. 20 Seyon Street provides excellent access to Interstates 90, 95, Route 2 and the MBTA Commuter Rail. Neighboring institutions and corporations include Repligen, Modalis, Affinia, ArrantaBio, Adca, Humatics and Panasonic. In addition to immediate access to the MBTA Commuter Rail, nearby amenities include Stop & Shop, Dunkin’ Donuts, Rite Aid, Shaw’s, BJ’s, D’Angelo, Russo’s, Subway, and Ocean State Job Lot.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: CBRE is pleased to present the unique 94,268 SF availability of 20 Seyon Street in Watertown, Massachusetts. The size, specifications, and location of the property make it a tremendous opportunity for many different uses, including GMP, light industrial and manufacturing.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Light Industrial/Manufacturing Opportunity

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
Situated immediately adjacent to the MBTA South Attleboro
commuter rail station, the Property is within a 45 minute drive of Boston and Worcester and within a 15 minute drive of Providence, RI, offering future tenants the opportunity to take advantage of same-day delivery and the last mile logistical requirements.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: CBRE is pleased to present the new availability at 505 Collins Street, a 202,863 SF warehouse building located adjacent to Interstate 95 off Exit 2A in Attleboro, Massachusetts. The site can also accommodate a 90,000 SF expansion onto the Building. 505 Collins Street offers unparalleled access and logistical connectivity throughout New England.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Interchange Location Available at 505 Collins Street, Attleboro

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Located within proximity to Interstate 93 near numerous restaurants, retail and hotel establishments.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
CBRE is pleased to announce the availability of space for lease at 299 Ballardvale Street in Wilmington,  Massachusetts . 299 Ballardvale consist s of 75,000 SF of first class office/flex/light manufacturing space located in a mature corporate setting within proximity to Interstate 93. Building features include extensive window line, an efficient floor plate, substantial power and HVAC infrastructure, and plentiful parking. 

Amenities on-site include New on-site fitness center with shower/locker facilities , planned on-site grab & go food/beverage service, dining/collaboration area, and outdoor seating areas located at the adjacent park building. Proximity to numerous restaurants, retail and hotel establishments .

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: First class office, flex/light manufacturing space

The proposed facility can accommodate up to 30 tailboard docks (1 per 3,300 SF) and a tremendous parking ratio of 2 per 1,000 SF.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: The building offers ideal access for commuting and distributing with access to Route 3, Route 128 and Interstate 95.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Franklin Industrial Park is conveniently located just minutes from Interstate 495 at Exit 16, offering exceptional on-off trucking access. The park neighbors many of the area's most recognizable names including EMC Corporation, Owens & Minor, FedEx, Thermo Fisher Scientific, Cold Chain Technologies, Barrett Distribution and Lindenmeyr Munroe. Area amenities include numerous restaurants, day care, convenience retail and several hotels.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: On behalf of Nuveen, CBRE is pleased to present an exciting leasing opportunity in the Franklin Industrial Park, located at 111 Constitution Boulevard. Built in 2000, the property offers state-of-the-art design and construction over 192,000 SF, including 30' clear height, ESFR sprinkler system, excellent loading, 40' W x 50' D column spacing and 120' truck court with concrete pad. The building was named 2011 ENERGY STAR® Sustained Excellence Award Winner by the EPA.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
Regarded as the premier high-bay
warehouse/distribution asset north of Boston, 14 Aegean Drive is located immediately off of Exit 47 on Interstate 93 and just five miles north of Interstate 495, making it an ideal solution for users who require easy access to Greater Boston, as well as southern New Hampshire and northern New England.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
We are pleased to announce the availability of 85,414 square feet consisting of state-of-the-art Class A warehouse/distribution space at 14 Aegean Drive in Methuen, Massachusetts.

Constructed in 2002, the building features include 30’ clear height, ample loading (12 tailboard dock doors and one drive-in door), 54’ x 36’ column spacing, concrete block construction, and an ESFR sprinkler system, among other attributes. 14 Aegean Drive features many of the high-quality finishes and base building infrastructure required by today’s distribution users

Billerica Commerce Center | 90 Salem Road, Billerica

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: On behalf of Marcus Partners, CBRE’s Industrial Leasing Team is excited to bring to your attention the availability of ±150,000 SF of brand-new, Class A, high-bay distribution space at 206 Grove Street in Franklin MA. 206 Grove Street is a state-of-the-art spec building designed to cater to specialized uses. The ±150,000 SF building is cold storage or biomanufacturing ready with ample power, town water/sewer, fully customizable finishes, and reinforced structure.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: New High-Bay Spec Construction Opportunity - 206 Grove Street, Franklin

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Located on Route 140 directly off Interstate 495 at Exit 43, Bellingham Business Center is situated on a ±18.96-acre site.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: On behalf of Nuveen, CBRE is pleased to announce the availability of a ±39,925 SF high-bay warehouse space at Bellingham Business Center.  The property offers state-of-the-art design including 32' clear height, an ESFR sprinkler system and a 120' truck court. Bellingham Business Center is within minutes to many retail, day care and hotel options. The property also offers excellent access to Forge Park MBTA Commuter Rail Station. Corporate neighbors include Thermo Fisher Scientific, Tegra Medical, Mattress Firm, AR Metallizing, Amazon, Snyder’s Lance, 7-11, Dealer Tire, Estes Express and Victory Packaging.

Corporate
neighbors include EMC Corporation, Waters Corporation, Amazon, Seracare Life Sciences, Caremark, and Victory Packaging.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: On behalf of ownership, CBRE is excited to present Medway Business Center for lease. Located at 51 Alder Street, Medway Business Center is a state-of-the-art ±163,640 SF warehouse/flex/manufacturing building in Medway, Massachusetts completed in 2003. This unique, Class A facility can accommodate a number of uses ranging from office, R&D/flex or warehouse.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Medway Business Center - Warehouse Space Available at 51 Alder Street, Medway

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: New flex, manufacturing, warehouse space available at Quarry Square at 196 E Main Street in Milford, MA. This 132,575 SF building can accommodate a user needing manufacturing, storage use and fully air conditioned space with short-term opportunities available.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: 73,034 SF - Industrial Space Available

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
CBRE is pleased to offer a 24,375 SF warehouse space available for sublease at 44 Rose Street in Springfield, Massachusetts.

This space is located in an industrial area of Springfield with great proximity to Interstate 291, Interstate 90 (Mass Pike) and just minutes to Interstate 91 servicing the intersection of New England. This building is currently offering sublease space from a national solid waste collection firm.
